snippet: The South Street Seaport is still closed because of the damage wrought by Hurricane Sandy in October, but the TKTS discount booth will reopen.
lead_paragraph: The South Street Seaport is still closed because of the damage wrought by Hurricane Sandy in October, but the TKTS discount booth will reopen.

headline.print_headline: TKTS Booth to Reopen At South Street Seaport
headline.main: TKTS Booth to Reopen at South Street Seaport
